root.text:
Code Maniacs is an event that tests your logical, mathematical and programming skills.
Love problem solving and coding?. Then this event is completely for you !
The first round consists of Technical MCQ's, the next round goes with 1 on 1 coding challenge and the final round is an online coding round. Only the shortlisted teams from each round will be moved on to the next round.
while(alive)
{
keep_coding();
}

text: Each team can have maximum 2 members.
No team should discuss with the other.
No usage of mobile phones or other gadgets during the event.

root.text: ROUND-1: Press Any Key to Continue…
Round one is an eliminator round. Participants will be given with a set of MCQ’s. The team that scores the maximum score within the stipulated time would be allowed to move on to the next round.

The second round is a 1 on 1 challenge round. Participants will be given with a set of questions each of which has the same level of difficulty. The team which solves the given question before the opponent does, qualifies for the next round.
The Third round is a Online Coding round, the team which solves the question by passing maximum number of test cases will be awarded. Note: Time taken to solve the question is important.
